description:
Keep track of trail conditions, snow study notes, or your bird checklist regardless of the weather. Rite in the Rain paper won't turn to mush when exposed to rain, sweat, mud, or oil.

  • Cover and reference cards are made of recycled post-consumer waste
  • 32 sheets of FSC certified paper. Paper is recyclable
  • Printing inks are 100% soy based
  • Dimensions are 12 x 18cm
name: Rite in the Rain Waterproof 7x4 Side Spiral Notebook
